tool_description: Quickly summarize web articles with OpenAI
name: Summate.it
title: Summate.it

api_list.name: Summarize
api_list.description: Pass in a web article URL and get a summary of the article back. Optionally you can pass in a language code you'd like the summary to be translated to.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the web article to be summarized

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Determined if a shorter (default) or longer summary should returned. To return a slightly longer summary, pass 'expand' here.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language the summary should be translated to. Leave blank to keep the summary in the same language as the article.
